div.p:
Demographic reconstruction of the most favored models for each bird studied at 5-fold molecular rates. The colored plot lines represent median posterior estimates of the product of effective population size ( N
e ) and generation time ( g). Times are in thousands of years before present (Ka). Timeframes are marked by grey areas. LIG, last interglacial period, ~112–132 Ka; LGM, last glacial maximum, ~19–26 Ka
